title: Production of Mask Oil Using a Biogas-Fired Reactor with Fly Ash Catalyst and Its Assessment in a Diesel Engine

Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

D Rajakullayappa, G Karthikeyan , Premkumar P, Elangkathir V, C.G. Saravanan
During the COVID-19 pandemic, disposable masks were widely used, which caused substantial environmental concerns due to improper disposal and plastic pollution. The masks, primarily made from polypropylene, represent not only...
